channel.title: Comments on: Vim for people that don’t want to use it
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: eek
item.dc:creator: eek
item.description: set nocompatible is not needed, it gets set by default when vimrc is created / found.
item.content:encoded: set nocompatible is not needed, it gets set by default when vimrc is created / found.

item.title: By: Oliver Caldwell
item.dc:creator: Oliver Caldwell
item.description: And here's a quickstart script to basically do all of this for you: https://gist.github.com/Wolfy87/565a10de340f392a98be
